name: LAYNIE AND BELLE DESIGN GOODNESS! *PERSONAL LICENSE*
description:
I hope you are as excited as I am about the goodness I have for you!!!  Included in this pack you will receive over 50 files that can be used personally for anything you want!!!  If you are a designer that loves my style or you are in a crunch creating something for a client, please purchase the commercial license!

Included you will receive all the content to the right.  

6 hi-res watercolor brushes
1 ©do not copy brush for watermarking images
18 hi-res watercolor potpourri of plants and flowers!
10 other watercolor randoms
11 hand-drawn randoms
12 watercolor frames in different (awesome) colors!!!  

All of these files can be color customized using some photoshop action like layering, clipping masks, and hue&saturation!  Just google for simple tutorials on how to accomplish this!

Use any of these files to create your own blog, website, marketing materials, Facebook timeline covers, and timelines, and so much more!!!

The fonts used in the blog display showing how awesome you can create with just using a few of the elements are purchased font:

Asterism by Molly Jacques 
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/asterism/

and free font:
Haity Font
http://www.dafont.com/haityfont.font

The font files are not included in the zipped file you will receive.  Your files are automatically delivered to you per your paying e-mail address!  They can be downloaded with the link provided!

If you have any questions in regards to the this goodness please e-mail me at ash@laynieandbelle.com

Troubleshooting or advice is not given on how to use or create with these files, and includes teaching Photoshop!  Google is a wonderful thing :)

name: be still...-calligraphy and watercolor print
description:
This print was made by me!  "Be still" is just one of those thoughts that come to mind when life is going by way too fast!  Especially when I look at my girlies!  I would give them the world if I could!  They are growing up way too fast!  

This is a print I made them for their room!  Their room and toy room is decked out in custom prints I have created for them, and this is by far my most favorite!

This is a high-res file measuring 8x10.  It is being delivered in JPEG format at a 300 dpi.  It can be printed up to a 16x20 canvas, but would be perfect printed from your home printer and framed so it can be displayed somewhere for the daily reminder!

Take everyday one step at a time. 

Be still my heart....


The digital file will be automatically delivered to you with the e-mail you paid with (or your paypal e-mail)  Please check your spam folder!  This print is copyright by Laynie and Belle and cannot be shared or sold as your own.  By purchasing this print you agree to the terms stated above.  This print can be printed up to 2 times, please purchase another another print to print more than twice.  The image cannot be digitally altered by anyone other than the original artist, Ashley Stamper of Laynie and Belle.  If you have questions regarding anything stated above, please feel free to contact me here or e-mail directly ash@laynieandbelle.com

name: DIGITAL Custom Calligraphy Lettering
description:
This is a SPECIAL listing limited to 15 custom calligraphy letterings done by Ashley Stamper of Laynie and Belle.  Custom calligraphy logos have become one of my favorite things to offer my design clients.  You will be  delivered a variety of files that can be used as your watermark, logo, blog header, website logo, marketing materials for online and printing, and stamps!  This is something that is very limited and is rarely ever offered!  

You will be given *one* draft with your choice of words (up to 50 characters) and you are able to make *one* change to the lettering before it is finalized and prepared for delivery.  A draft will be sent within 1 week of your purchase for you to finalize.  For additional amendments a charge of $10 will apply.  

Please leave me a note letting me know your choice of words, and any special requests for them (such as layout, or letters desired to be made in a specific way....people are finicky about the lower case 'a' for instance)  You are more than welcome to send over an example of what you prefer to ash@laynieandbelle.com.  Considering this is hand-drawn by Ashley Stamper, please take note of her particular style!  There are absolutely no refunds due to the nature of this listing.  Please note that this listing does not include any sort of graphic elements, loops, swirls, etc...it is just for the text.

The files delivered are as follows
12x12 psd
12x12 trimmed png
1000x1000 trimmed png
abr brush file for watermarking
Pdf file for printing/stamps

Vectorized file supplied if requested.

BONUS!!!!!!!!!!
Receive the © do not copy in a digitalized hand-lettered calligraphy form to use on your images.  Can be use separately or combined with your logo.

name: Love Printable for SHES Support Fund
description:
This printable is inspired by the events in CT. The balloons represent each sweet person that was lost. There is a faint hand reaching from the clouds grabbing the balloon.

This is a great print to gift to the people that educate the children in our lives!  Also, it is a great daily remainder on how to live.  The bright colors are very complimenting and uplifting for any space <3

You will receive an e-mail immediately after purchasing with a link to download a zip file containing a high quality 16x20 and 8x10 print at 300dpi.  An enhanced copy of the same print for canvas printing, and a bonus size of 14x14 at 300dpi for paper or canvas printing.
